1: -module(mad_SUITE).
    2: -compile([export_all]).
    3: 
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    6: 
    7: -define(eq(E, A), ?assertEqual(E, A)).
    8: 
    9: all() -> 
   10:     [sanity_check,
   11:      generate_subnet_addrs].
   12: 
   13: %%
   14: %% Tests
   15: %%
   16: 
   17: sanity_check(_) ->
   18:     ok.
   19: 
   20: generate_subnet_addrs(_) ->
   21:     M = mad,
   22:     Addrs = M:generate_subnet_addrs({192,168,100,0}, 22),
   23:     ?eq([{192,168,100,0}, {192,168,100,1}, {192,168,100,2}],
   24:         [ lists:nth(I, Addrs) || I <- lists:seq(1,3) ]),
   25:     ?eq([{192,168,103,253}, {192,168,103,254}, {192,168,103,255}],
   26:         lists:nthtail(254, Addrs)).
